data.author: P. J. Reed
data.message:
Support ROS2 (#24)

Convert this repository to support ROS 2 Dashing.

This also splits the old gps_common package up into separate packages, gps_msgs and gps_tools, which contain the old message and nodes & scripts, respectively.

Distribution Statement A; OPSEC #2893

Signed-off-by: P. J. Reed <preed@swri.org>

data.author: ktossell
data.message:
Merge pull request #4 from ayrton04/master

Fixing orientation in UTM odometry message

data.author: Tom Moore
data.message:
Fixing orientation in UTM odometry message

Before the fix, the orientation in the odometry message was set to x = 1, y = 0, z = 0, w = 0. This corresponds to Euler angles of roll = pi, pitch = 0, yaw = 0. I believe the intent was for the orientation to be the identity, which is x = 0, y = 0, z = 0, w = 1.

data.message: version 0.1.5

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message:
Do a blocking read using gps->waiting().

libgpsmm v5's read() method doesn't block, so the node
was busy waiting.

Thanks to Achim Königs!

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: 0.1.4: add missing WATCH_ENABLE command for libgps>=5

data.author: Ken Tossell

data.message: renamed gpsd dependency to libgps, removed gpsd server

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: updated gpsd_client for GPSd API v5

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message:
Added ~check_fix_by_variance parameter.

If this parameter is set to true, the driver will publish
fix messages even when the variance is undefined (NaN).
Thanks to Martin Weis for the patch.

data.author: Steven Bellens
data.message:
gps_umd: add rosdep for fedora

Signed-off-by: Steven Bellens <steven.bellens@mech.kuleuven.be>

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message:
Adding ~use_gps_time parameter (default true).
 * If false, stamp NavSatFix with system time, not GPS time.
Prevent publication of fixes when error estimate is NaN.
 * This occurs on some messages when GPSd says status=OK, but there's no recent fix.

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: Adding ~child_frame_id parameter.

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: version 0.1.2

data.message: NodeHandle(parent, "~") isn't working, so switch to NH("~")

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: Updating UTM GPS->Odometry converter to use NavSatFix. Adding covariance.

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: version 0.1.1

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message:
Making GPSStatus.status signed, since NO_FIX=-1 now.
Moved gpsd_client to updated GPSFix format.
gpsd_client now reports both NavSatFix (fix) and GPSFix (fix_extended).

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message:
Adding GPSStatus to GPSFix message.
Copied ENU covariance matrix from NavSatFix.
Renumberd STATUS_* constants so they're compatible with NavSatStatus.
Expanded stack description.

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message:
updating with changes for Diamondback
 * move from gps_common/Nav* msgs to sensor_msgs/Nav*
 * use NavSatFix by default
 * fix stack dependencies

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: adding dependencies (roscreate-stack)

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message:
Adding support for NavSatFix (to appear in ROS Diamondback).
New parameter to gpsd_client:
  ~report_as:
   "gps" -> fix=GPSFix, status=GPSStatus
   "navsat" -> fix=NavSatFix
   default = gps, to switch upon release of ROS DBK

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: Applying patch from Bill Morris to fix gpsd_client's monitor-mode enabling under gpsd API version 4.

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: Adding utm_odometry_node and UTM conversions

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: Moving gpsd_client to gps_umd stack, switching to gps_common messages, updating message format, adding support for new gpsd API. (gpsd_client doesn't yet implement all of the features specified in the gps_common messages.)

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message: Splitting GPSInfo into GPSFix and GPSStatus, removing UTM

data.author: Ken Tossell
data.message:
Adding gps_common (standardization efforts for common messages and
conversion routines, to be merged into ros-pkg at some point)
